review: A friend recommended this and I am so glad she did.  It was easy to set up and with my Amazon Prime I have lots of options to choose from.  I did not need any additional extension.  Definitely recommend.
author: NancBinCO

review: Awesome product that allows older tvs to watch via the Internet.  Well worth the money!!
author: s.reece

review: I am in love with this product!
author: Leslie

review: Easy to install. Works good. Amazon Prime should set up more brands of televisions to be able to receive Prime video without the use of a Fire stick. Some brands of television don'the need the Fire stick.
author: Walter L. Moser

review: Initially had a few problems with our wireless router dropping the bandwidth so we would first lose the  sound and then the picture. We found out it was having interferece issues from our Direct TV dish wiring, our ISP tech did a scan and found the problem once this was resolved all is o.k..
author: Richard Doll

review: Excellent purchase thus far! I'm pleased
author: Tayuanna

review: Unfortunately, I cannot get this thing to work. I've had it since Christmas and it I've tried everything to fix it. Although I don't have a Roku, Chrome Stick, or any other simple wifi stick, I would recommend anything else over the Fire stick. It doesn't work well at all. It drops connection regularly to a point where it's unwatchable. My xbox360 worked better.
author: Brad Mitchell
